## Workspace.allInputsFilled() method

Checks whether all value and statement inputs in the workspace are filled with blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allInputsFilled(opt_shadowBlocksAreFilled?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_shadowBlocksAreFilled | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional argument controlling whether shadow blocks are counted as filled. Defaults to true. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if all inputs are filled, false otherwise.
